      • addNumberOnNode

        private javafx.scene.layout.StackPane addNumberOnNode​(Node node)
        This method numerates the nodes but creating a stack pane with the node's shape (a circle) and some text (the node's number) on it.
        Parameters:
        node - The node which needs an number added to it.
        Returns:
        A stackpane consisting of the node's shape (a circle) and some text indicating the node's number.

      • setGameResponseLabelText

        s - : Game response text
